title: Dr. Kristin Kobes Du Mez: Jesus and John Wayne
description:
Dr. Kristin Kobes Du Mez has written a book on white evangelical masculinity and militarism. She's a professor of History at Calvin College. Mutual church friends had told me she was interested in the work of Jordan Peterson but we never got a chance to talk about that before she wrote the book. The publisher furnished me with an advanced copy so we dive into her story and the story behind the book. 



Jesus and John Wayne https://amzn.to/33syxPO
